description: Complete system overview describing the video overlay and synchronization architecture, key components, and their interactions
Detailed documentation of the three core algorithms: Frame Fingerprinting, Spatial Alignment, and Temporal Alignment Engines, including implementation details and optimizations
Comprehensive documentation of the video processing pipeline, data flow between components, and how the various alignment algorithms work together during composition
Documentation of core data models including FrameFingerprint, FrameAlignment, and related structures used throughout the video processing pipeline
Detailed implementation documentation for the Full and Mask temporal alignment engines, including their unique approaches and optimizations
